alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central El Paso County through 645 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peyton, or 22 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Peyton and Black Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
